summary: Mobile app project: “Azhari Tours & Travels” (Azhari Hajj Umrah Ziyarat) for Hajj/Umrah/Ziyarat bookings, showing contact details (phone/WhatsApp), address + Google Maps link, hotel distance info (Mecca/Madina), Instagram link, and a booking form with a scrolling month selector collecting client name and phone number. User also wants an Android/iOS-style installable app experience (not just a mobile-styled web app).
architectural_notes: Decide delivery approach for Android/iOS-style experience (e.g., PWA installability vs hybrid/native packaging) and align build/distribution accordingly.
ICP deployment URL/custom domain must follow gateway constraints (5–50 chars; only letters, numbers, hyphens). Choose a valid domain/subdomain and redeploy to avoid canister resolution failures.
known_issues: PWA link https://azhari-tours-travels.icp0.io fails for some users with 'Canister ID Not Resolved (ERROR 400)' due to canister/domain resolution (likely invalid/mismatched domain).

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-first, responsive single-page app branded as “Azhari Tours & Travels” with the subtitle “Azhari Hajj Umrah Ziyarat”, optimized for phone screens (mobile-style layout, large tap targets, sticky primary CTA).

Add a “Contact & Location” section that displays: Phone number +919926408385, WhatsApp number +919926408385, address “Naya Mohalla near Khalid Apartment, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh”, and a Google Maps link https://maps.app.goo.gl/ozeP3Y9UqdHacrCy6. Phone and WhatsApp numbers must be tappable links (tel: and wa.me) and the Maps link must open in a new tab.
Add a “Hotels Distance Info” section that displays: “Mecca hotel: 500m to 1km” and “Madina hotel: 300m to 600m”.
Add an “Instagram” link section that points to https://www.instagram.com/_azhari_hajj_umrah_ziyarat?igsh=dDA1dnFva2VmY3Bi and opens in a new tab.

Implement a booking form that collects (required): client name and client phone number, and includes a month “slot” selector using a scrolling pattern (mobile-friendly scroll/picker behavior) to choose a month.
Connect the frontend booking form to the backend booking creation method using the app’s standard data-fetching approach (React Query), including loading and error states.

Choose and apply a cohesive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a travel/booking brand, and enforce it consistently across all sections. Do not use a blue+purple primary palette.
Add generated static brand images and render them in the UI (e.g., app header/hero) from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve generated images from the backend).
Make the existing Azhari Tours & Travels web app installable as a Progressive Web App (PWA) with an Android/iOS-style home-screen installed experience (standalone display mode).
Add PWA metadata to the HTML entry point for a mobile-app-like experience on Android and iOS, including linking the manifest, setting theme-related meta tags, and enabling iOS web app capability.

Add an in-app, user-friendly install prompt UX that guides users to install the app: support the Android install prompt (beforeinstallprompt) and provide iOS “Add to Home Screen” instructions when the automatic prompt is not available.
Add a service worker to support PWA installation requirements and basic offline resilience for static assets (app shell).
Include and reference proper app icons for PWA + iOS home screen installation (including a maskable icon) using static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Add an in-app “App Link” area that shows the current app URL (window.location.origin) and provides a one-tap Copy button so users can reliably share the exact working link from their device/browser.

Add a user-facing troubleshooting panel for gateway resolution failures that explicitly addresses “Canister ID Not Resolved (Error 400)” and instructs users to try alternative networks/browsers, and to open the app using the exact link shown in the new “App Link” area.

Use the user-provided desired domain text “azhari tours & travels” to derive a valid ICP-friendly slug (letters/numbers/hyphens only; no spaces or ampersands) and surface that slug in a small admin/developer note inside the UI (for example in the footer) so the intended canonical hostname is unambiguous during deployment/link sharing.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a mobile app named “Azhari Tours & Travels” for Hajj/Umrah/Ziyarat bookings
Display business contact details: phone +919926408385 and WhatsApp +919926408385
Show address and location link: Naya Mohalla near Khalid Apartment, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh + Google Maps link
Include hotel distance information: Mecca hotel 500m–1km and Madina hotel 300m–600m
Add booking UI with a scrolling month selector for choosing a month/slot
Booking form collects client name and client phone number
Display Instagram link for the business profile

Persist submitted bookings in the Motoko backend. A booking record must store: clientName, clientPhone, selectedMonth, and createdAt timestamp. Expose a backend method to create a booking and return a success response.
Provide an Android/iOS-style installable app experience for the existing mobile-styled web app (e.g., installable build/distribution approach)
Package and publish the app to the Google Play Store (wrap PWA into Android app bundle/AAB and submit via Play Console)
Package and publish the app to the Apple App Store (wrap into native iOS container and submit via Xcode/App Store Connect)
